quotes.quote: Do nothing which is of no use
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Study strategy over the years and achieve the spirit of the warrior. Today is victory over yourself of yesterday; tomorrow is your victory over lesser men.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Perceive that which cannot be seen with the eye.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Perception is strong and sight weak. In strategy it is important to see distant things as if they were close and to take a distanced view of close things.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Engage in combat fully determined to die and you will be alive; wish to survive in the battle and you will surely meet death.
quotes.author: Uesugi Kenshin

quotes.quote: A samurai should always be prepared for death – whether his own or someone else’s.
quotes.author: Stan Sakai

quotes.quote: Sword and mind must be united.
quotes.author: Yamada Jirokichi

quotes.quote: If you launch without vigor, seven out of every ten of your actions will not reach their target.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: The spiritual aspect of valor is evidenced by composure -the calm presence of mind. Tranquility is courage in repose.
quotes.author: Inazo Nitobe
